publications.name: Towards a Higher-Order Mathematical Operational Semantics
publications.summary: This works gives an answer to the long-standing issue of applying Turi and Plotkin's Abstract GSOS framework, or at least its underlying ideas, to higher-order languages. It also marked the beginning of the HO (Abstract) GSOS programme. There is really not much more to say; I will simply add that nailing this result was an arduous task, and it took us a while to figure out how to model the lambda calculus.

projects.name: Higher-order Abstract GSOS
projects.summary: Developing a categorical framework for the operational semantics of higher-order programming languages
